Detailed Description

cvmx_nqm_vf::_cpl::_base_addr_n_sz

NQM_VF(x)_CPL(0..16)_BASE_ADDR_N_SZ are the CPL queue base addresses for function x. Includes both admin and IO queues. NQM_VF_MODE[VF_MODE] selects the queues and functions that are actually present in the hardware. See NQM_VF_MODE_E.

This CSR should only be written and should only be migrated when this CPL/CQ is idle. The corresponding NQM_VF()_CQ()_ENA[ENABLE] is an enable for this CPL/CQ. NQM_VF()_CQ()_ENA[ENABLE] describes CPL/CQ idle conditions.
